thread.title: Cruz, Paul, Carson rally against abortion
thread.title_full: Cruz, Paul, Carson rally against abortion

author: Molly K. Hooper
title: Cruz, Paul, Carson rally against abortion
text:
Cruz, Paul, Carson rally against abortion By Molly K. Hooper - 07/28/15 05:40 PM EDT 
Three 2016 GOP presidential contenders urged lawmakers to withdraw federal funding for Planned Parenthood in the wake of a series of undercover videos of the organization. ADVERTISEMENT GOP Sens. Rand Paul (Ky.) and Ted Cruz (Texas) joined Ben Carson in addressing nearly 100 people attending an anti-abortion rights rally outside the U.S. Capitol.
Conservative Rep. Marsha Blackburn (R-Tenn.) tells The Hill's Molly K. Hooper that she thinks defunding Planned Parenthood “is going to be an issue,” in the 2016 election. 
To hear the candidates and Blackburn, please watch the video above. Past: 1 day Two weeks to go: Republicans... With only 10 getting on stage, candidates are trying to get their poll...
